config.text: Demolition and Stabilization Tracker
Demolition and Stabilization Tracker

Welcome to the Demo Tracker by the Demolition Department!


Discover information about demolitions and stabilizations happening near a specific address and its vicinity.


If you're unsure of the address, you can utilize these search methods: select "Find address or place" in the search box or click anywhere on the map. Use Area the button to navigate to specific districts or neighborhoods.


To minimize the demo progress on the map, click the Type button to deselect them individually. To see the demolition type key, click on the green button on the right side of the map. Note that the key will only be shown at a zoomed in map level.


For printing a property list, simply click the Print button located at the top left corner of the map.
